name: Frontend Coding Challenge
description: Solve real-world frontend problems using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern UI practices.

name: UI/UX Design Contest
description: Design a clean, modern, and user-friendly interface for a startup product idea.

name: JavaScript Quiz Battle
description: Test your JavaScript knowledge with timed MCQs and logic-based challenges.

name: Photography Contest
description: Capture stunning moments and showcase your creativity through photography.

name: Competitive Programming Marathon
description: Solve complex algorithmic problems using C++, Java, or Python under time pressure.

name: Content Writing Challenge
description: Write engaging articles on technology, innovation, and future trends.

name: Data Analysis Challenge
description: Analyze real datasets and present insights using charts and dashboards.

name: Digital Marketing Strategy Contest
description: Create a winning digital marketing strategy for a new online product.

name: AI Prompt Engineering Contest
description: Craft effective AI prompts for creative writing, coding, and automation tasks.

name: Bug Bounty Challenge
description: Find bugs and security vulnerabilities in provided sample applications.

name: Backend Development Hackathon
description: Build scalable backend APIs using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with best practices.
